title: How to Create Your Own Fire Extinguisher With Household Items

steps.title: Fill the plastic bottle with 1/3 cups vinegar.
steps.content: Fill the plastic bottle with 1/3 cups vinegar. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Fill the bottle with water but leave 1.5 inches (6 cm) empty space left.
steps.content: Fill the bottle with water but leave 1.5 inches (6 cm) empty space left.

steps.title: Get 2 pieces of toilet paper and place 2 table spoons of baking soda on it fold it.
steps.content: Get 2 pieces of toilet paper and place 2 table spoons of baking soda on it fold it. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Drill a small hole (carefully) on the cap and put the bag through the cap.
steps.content: Drill a small hole (carefully) on the cap and put the bag through the cap.

steps.title: When ready to use push the bag in to the slack point and save the day.
steps.content: When ready to use push the bag in to the slack point and save the day. [3] X Research source
